availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Crawford C. Adams (Paulding County, Ohio, resident and soldier.)

body.p: Paulding County, Ohio, resident and soldier. Ohio native. Married to Maggie H. Goshom Adams in Paulding County, Ohio, on September 18, 1861. Resident in Paulding County in 1850. Served in the 14th Ohio Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A) as a first lieutenant from August 26, 1861 to June 27, 1874.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Paulding County, Carryall, p. 180A.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Paulding County Marriages, Film 000317303, p. 16.
Official Roster of the Soldiers of the State of Ohio in the War of the Rebellion, 1861-1865, Vol. I. (Akron, OH: The Werner Company, 1893), 414.
